name: pixiu-trading-system
description: Pixiu quantitative trading system - microservices architecture

scripts.test:all: npm run test:infrastructure && npm run test:adapters && npm run test:services
scripts.test:infrastructure: npm run test -w @pixiu/shared-core && npm run test -w @pixiu/adapter-base -- --passWithNoTests && npm run test -w @pixiu/test-utils -- --passWithNoTests
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:infrastructure && npm run test:coverage:adapters && npm run test:coverage:services
scripts.test:coverage:infrastructure: npm run test:coverage -w @pixiu/shared-core && npm run test:coverage -w @pixiu/adapter-base -- --passWithNoTests && npm run test:coverage -w @pixiu/test-utils -- --passWithNoTests
scripts.test:watch: concurrently "npm run test:watch -w @pixiu/shared-core" "npm run test:watch -w @pixiu/adapter-base" "npm run test:watch -w @pixiu/binance-adapter" "npm run test:watch -w @pixiu/exchange-collector"
scripts.build: npm run build:infrastructure && npm run build:adapters && npm run build:services
scripts.build:infrastructure: npm run build -w @pixiu/shared-core && npm run build -w @pixiu/adapter-base
scripts.lint: npm run lint:infrastructure && npm run lint:adapters && npm run lint:services
scripts.lint:infrastructure: npm run lint -w @pixiu/shared-core && npm run lint -w @pixiu/adapter-base
scripts.format: npm run format:infrastructure && npm run format:adapters && npm run format:services
scripts.format:infrastructure: npm run format -w @pixiu/shared-core && npm run format -w @pixiu/adapter-base
scripts.clean: npm run clean:infrastructure && npm run clean:adapters && npm run clean:services

author: Pixiu Team
